name: Application Developers Alliance
goal: The Application Developers Alliance is a non-profit global membership association that promotes and supports the app development industry. Alliance membership includes developers, designers, publishers, platforms, device manufacturers, carriers and other service providers. The Alliance provides a collective voice for developers and aims to represent them on matters affecting the software development ecosystem. The Alliance believes EU policy should maximise the development of new online and mobile services and business models to the benefit of innovators and EU consumers. Therefore, the Alliance follows EU-level regulatory and policy developments relating to consumer and child protection, contract rules, privacy and data protection, international data transfers, platforms and digital intermediaries, Artificial Intelligence, e-health, e-skills and more broadly, the development of a European Digital Single Market facilitating innovation and the growth of the software industry.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: The Developers Alliance follows EU-level regulatory and policy developments relating to consumer and child protection, contract rules, privacy and data protection, international data transfers, platforms and digital intermediaries, Artificial Intelligence, e-health, e-skills and more broadly, the development of a European Digital Single Market facilitating innovation and the growth of the software industry.
